metadata.title: CVE-2018-16064 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Extensions API in Google Chrome prior to68.0.3440.75 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to bypass navigation restrictions via a crafted ChromeExtension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
